A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't nessecarily disagree with any of the decisions Rian Johnson and others made in regards to the story and the direction of the characters; I loved how unique it was in terms of a Star Wars movie. However\, the execution of those desicions seemed to be the failure of this movie for me. The comedy was certainly NOT organic; in fact it may have been the most derailing element of the whole movie. And once I was off the rails\, I couldn't get back on. No matter how much I wanted to believe in the characters desicions\, arcs\, and newly found powers\, and no matter how much I love the Star Wars saga as a whole\, I just couldn't get back on the track\, and I didn't believe anything I was seeing as an audience member. I will be watching this again to try and appreciate more of the good desicions the film makers made\, but as for my first viewing I was underwhelmed and disappointed.
